page.title: 04THE FARMHOUSE KITCHEN
page.content: THERE IS AN ELECTRIC COOKER WITH 4 BOILING RINGS AND A SMALL EYE LEVEL GRILL,OVEN WITH ROTTISERIE, FRIDGE FREEZER,GLASS AND STAINLESS STEELE SAUCHEPANS AND PRESSURE COOKER( WHICH REDUCES COOKING TIME AND LOSS OF VITAMINS.OWING TO THE INCREASE IN ARTIFICIAL COLOURING,FLAVOURING AND PRESERVEATIVES HOME AND FARM PRODUCE IS USED.MILK IS READILLY AVAILABLE AND USED IN QUANTITY FOR BREAKFAST PORRIDGE AND MILK-BASED SWEETS FORT MID-DAY MEALS.PORK LAMB AND CHICKEN FROM LOCAL PRODUCERS IS PURCHASED FOR THE FREEZER. FRUIT AND VEGATABLES FROM THE GARDEN AND LOCAL PRODUCERS ARE USED FOR JAM AND PICKLES AND STORAGE IN THE FREEZER.
